from.description: Start timestamp of the duration for which the Point Histories are requested

to.description: End timestamp of the duration for which the Point Histories are requested

lastObservation.description: Include the last observation carried forward (_INCLUDE_LOCF_) or only return the histories within the requested time range (_EXCLUDE_)

convertTo.description: Convert Point Histories to either their original (_RAW_) or standardised (_STANDARD_) unit
